Skip to Main Content יברכך השם וישמרך Bless You HaShem and safeguard You ​ **Please see this continued at AyshDath.com! This is the Torah of Mashiach/Redemption so humble yourself and focus onto your soul a spirit of the Fear of HaShem or you could be left non existent for eternity for spurning/sleeping on Us Heaven save us!!​​ Psalm 50:16 "And to the wicked G-d says What is it for you to relate My Decrees?" -Get out of here and cease to be. You know better than to cricket and Chassile my vineyards H'F' ​Isaiah 55:1-3 ה֤וֹי כׇּל־צָמֵא֙ לְכ֣וּ לַמַּ֔יִם וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר אֵֽין־ל֖וֹ כָּ֑סֶף לְכ֤וּ שִׁבְרוּ֙ וֶאֱכֹ֔לוּ וּלְכ֣וּ שִׁבְר֗וּ בְּלוֹא־כֶ֛סֶף וּבְל֥וֹא מְחִ֖יר יַ֥יִן וְחָלָֽב׃ Ho, all who are thirsty, Come for water, Even if you have no money; Come, buy food and eat: Buy grain without money, Wine and milk without cost. ​ לָ֤מָּה תִשְׁקְלוּ־כֶ֙סֶף֙ בְּלוֹא־לֶ֔חֶם וִיגִיעֲכֶ֖ם בְּל֣וֹא לְשׇׂבְעָ֑ה שִׁמְע֨וּ שָׁמ֤וֹעַ אֵלַי֙ וְאִכְלוּ־ט֔וֹב וְתִתְעַנַּ֥ג בַּדֶּ֖שֶׁן נַפְשְׁכֶֽם׃ Why do you spend money for what is not bread, Your earnings for what does not satisfy? Give heed to Me, And you shall eat choice food And delight in the fat, honorable gift of your bodies/souls. ​ הַטּ֤וּ אׇזְנְכֶם֙ וּלְכ֣וּ אֵלַ֔י שִׁמְע֖וּ וּתְחִ֣י נַפְשְׁכֶ֑ם וְאֶכְרְתָ֤ה לָכֶם֙ בְּרִ֣ית עוֹלָ֔ם חַֽסְדֵ֥י דָוִ֖ד הַנֶּאֱמָנִֽים׃ Incline your ear and come to Me; Hearken, and your bodies shall be revived. And I will make with you an everlasting covenant, The enduring loyalty promised to David. 53:1 ​מִ֥י הֶֽאֱמִ֖ין לִשְׁמֻֽעָתֵ֑נוּ וּזְר֥וֹעַ יְהֹוָ֖ה עַל־מִ֥י נִגְלָֽתָה Who would have believed our report, and the Arm of HaShem, upon who it is revealed?​ -- Nissan 29 19:19 some edits made at intro ​ Updates continued at TheMercifulOne.Net ​ !*!*!* Remember Sefirat HaOmer​ ​ *****There is no using any of my images or parts of my site for anything that is not Torah-service related/truly productive. ​ How to read Hebrew guide added below links list You can press Ctrl+F to find certain topics (if you are on a phone there should still be a "find" option - go with the latest words on the subject) ​ ​-- ​Adar 5 Bereisheit 2:5 וְכֹ֣ל ׀ שִׂ֣יחַ הַשָּׂדֶ֗ה טֶ֚רֶם יִֽהְיֶ֣ה בָאָ֔רֶץ וְכׇל־עֵ֥שֶׂב הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה טֶ֣רֶם יִצְמָ֑ח כִּי֩ לֹ֨א הִמְטִ֜יר יְהֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהִים֙ עַל־הָאָ֔רֶץ וְאָדָ֣ם אַ֔יִן לַֽעֲבֹ֖ד אֶת־הָֽאֲדָמָֽה׃ When no shrub of the field was yet on earth and no grasses of the field had yet sprouted, because God יהוה had not sent rain upon the earth and there were no human beings to till the soil, (JPS '06) ​ Instead see the face (there are at least 70 faces to the Torah) that this is another Mussar lesson that although man may exert himself exceedingly, even in Torah (as Pirkei Avot says if you know much Torah it was not for your sake but HaShem inspired you), all of the credit for success goes to HaShem.. ​ "And all of the shrubs/herbs [spiritually smaller people] had not yet come to life [from their sleep in the underworld 'Nor can all those who descend to silence (praise You)-Tehillim']. Indeed, if it were not for HaShem Elokim [bringing] the rain [Torah and inspiration to study Her] and Adam (the highest title of Jewish man, the tree) [is/would be] nothing (Ayin) to serve the land, (He had no eye for Torah, "Ain Ayin", as Rashi says the eyes can represent one's desires)" ​ Or ​ Adam would be hooked on (Vav is a hook and the 6 orders of the Mishnah, the explanation of the Written Torah containing the sweet honeys of Kabbalah clothed within) nothing to serve the land (how could he catch fish and trap game [convert people] with no hook?) How could HaShem hook Adam on loving His Creation without the brains behind It [Torah, the Will and Wisdom of HaShem] ​ Or ​ He could never hook Adam (rebuke Him with His Rod) without bringing the rain (giving Torah, Instruction) If He were to hook Adam without first giving Instruction, Adam would spiritually die and be Aiyn, nothing Heaven forbid. ​ The Salvation you are looking for: Yeshayahu Isaiah 65:15 וְהִנַּחְתֶּ֨ם שִׁמְכֶ֚ם לִשְׁבוּעָה֙ לִבְחִירַ֔י וֶֽהֱמִֽיתְךָ֖ אֲדֹנָ֣י יֱהֹוִ֑ה וְלַֽעֲבָדָ֥יו יִקְרָ֖א שֵׁ֥ם אַחֵֽר And your names will be pleasant/be put to rest to an oath/curse to My Elect Ones: And slay you, Adonaiy Eloheem. And to His Servants He will call a different name. Or if you are unsure just say "And The Lord Our God slay you!" ​An eternal death - Rashi ​ ​​Why? The heathen are trying to spiritually kill you (get you to forsake G-d Heaven forbid) that is infinitely worse than a physical death since you would have lived forever in Heaven or "rolled" (reincarnated and had another chance). When the heathen trap and kill righteous people, that person consumes all of their merit and ceases to be after death G-d save us! Tehillim/Psalms 118:10 כׇּל־גּוֹיִ֥ם סְבָב֑וּנִי בְּשֵׁ֥ם יְ֝הֹוָ֗ה כִּ֣י אֲמִילַֽם׃ All nations surround me; with the Name of The LORD I will surely cut them down. Therefore it is written Deut 19:21 וְלֹ֥א תָח֖וֹס עֵינֶ֑ךָ נֶ֣פֶשׁ בְּנֶ֗פֶשׁ עַ֤יִן בְּעַ֙יִן֙ שֵׁ֣ן בְּשֵׁ֔ן יָ֥ד בְּיָ֖ד רֶ֥גֶל בְּרָֽגֶל׃ And your eye shall not pity: life for life [soul for soul], eye for eye, tooth for tooth, hand for hand, foot for foot [the monetary value unless they are actively pursuing you or are liable for a capital sin]." ​ ​ Now please! You have been trapped by the covenant of the lips (Talmud/Gemara) by the kingdom of evil to speak negative things. It is of utmost importance to immediately free yourself by speaking Genesis 17:1 "I am the Almighty God, walk before Me and be perfect", or better yet "I Am The Lord your God who brings you forth from the land of Egypt to be your God. I Am The Lord your God" (Since this also fulfills the Mitzvah every day and night to remember the Exodus) - you will immediately become this and it will grow stronger over time granted no one traps you to contradict yourself or you stumble yourself with evil music or idle conversation Heaven Forbid! ​ Perek Shira - Chapter of Song נֶשֶׁר אוֹמֵר. וְאַתָּה יי אֱלֹהִים צְבָאוֹת אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל הָקִיצָה לִפְקֹד כָּל הַגּוֹיִם אַל תָּחֹן כָּל בֹּגְדֵי אָוֶן סֶלָה: (תהילים נט ו) The Eagle/Vulture is saying “And you, YHVH Elohim Tseva’ot, God of Yisra’el, awaken/sicken yourself to punish all the nations; do not be gracious to any wicked traitors (or 'wearers of iniquitous clothing' like condoms (outside of permitted marital reasons) or spandex that cause unfruitful emissions compared to World floods) Selah - Forever!” May we all adopt its Zealousness ​ ​Valuable resources - The Donkey sings to us "When you eat of the labors of your own hands, you are fortunate and it is good with you" TheMercifulOne.net - My living/growing Torah translation and commentary. Google.com/translate​ (also much more including a search engine) ​ DoitinHebrew.com ​ Sefaria.org - A Wellspring of Torah that you can highlight any word and click to see different definitions (preferably Jastrow and BDB) - Also beware of JPS translations, it is insightful for someone experienced with Hebrew but they often miss words If you cannot read Hebrew then Chabad's translation with Rashi (link) is better for Tanakh (Torah Neviim [Prophets] Cetuvim [Writings]) - They also have a lot of great Kabbalah/Chassidut ​​​ The Arizal says everyone should study some Zohar every day even if he does not understand it Chabad Chok LeYisrael ​ Rabbi Yitzhak Ginsburg's amazing site inner.org ​ My photography website if you want to make a donation and support my Torah study TeachingsOfEden.Github.io NaturalReaders.com text-to-audio so that you can listen instead of read **warning my image blocker does not block the images of the AI narrators but they are only headshots Shopping sites to fulfil the words of the Gra and acquire your needs through messengers (at even 2-3x the cost) - he says when one goes out into public he/she loses their spiritual level. ​ ***Beware of ads, use an image and ad blocker or be prepared to stomp an ear lobe AI sites: Chatgpt.com Gemini.google.com Beware these AI Rabbis are very often inaccurate and all of the AI's and search engines can be conspirational H'F' (I use these supplementally to find sources)- Rav.gpt Rebbe.io Ebay.com - All general goods including building/mechanics parts Amazon.com - Ebay alternative - not as good in quality Etsy.com - Small business website, good for plants, basic soaps, gems Instacart.com - local grocery and other store delivery for a small fee (1000x worth it). Kosh.com for meats, safe fish, and cheeses Kolfoods.com a competitor of Kosh Koshervitamins.com basic ingredient soaps/deodorants, vitamins, and misc. groceries iVapeX.com for Kosher vapes Tekhelet.com for Tzitzit ​ https://cnvmp3.com/v23 to download Youtube videos as mp3 to have a playlist on repeat on Shabbat instead of one song looped on Youtube --- ​ How to Read Hebrew ​א Alef, like A but silent - pronounce only the vowel ב Beit or Veit with no Dagesh (small dot like a period in the middle) Pronounced like B with the Dagesh or V without ג Gimmel - pronounced like G ד Dalet - like D ה Haey - like H ו Vav, pronounced like V. However, it can be used as a vowel placeholder letter like Alef. If it has a Dagesh above it, it is pronounced like "Oh". If the dagesh is in the middle (on the left), it is pronounced "Oo". ז Zayin - like Z ח Chet - like clearing one's throat - "Cchhh" ט Tet - like a T י Yud - like a Y כ Caf/Chaf - with a Dagesh in it is pronounced like a C, without is like a Chet (Cchhh). ל Lamed - pronounced like an L מ Mem - like an M נ Nun - like an N ס Samech - like an S ע Ayin - silent like an Alef פ Peh/Feh - With a Dagesh is like P, without is like F צ Tzadi - like a "Tz" at the same time (no good English comparison) ק Kuf - like a K ר Reish -  like an R ש Shin/Sin - like a "Shh" if the Dagesh is on the  top right, if left, like an S ת Taf/Thaf  - Like a T with a Dagesh or "Th" without (although only a few groups have maintained this. Ashkenazim said "S" [definitely don't do that] and Sephardim kept both as "T") ​​ ​ Vowels (corresponding to the Sefirot in order. The vowels are like the "soul" of the "body", the letter): ​ בָ - Kamatz (Keter/Will/Crown/Pleasure/Desire) - like "Ah" (In this case that Veit would be pronounced, 'Vah') ​ בַ - Patach (ChochMah/Wisdom) - Like Kamatz but very slightly different, a little more of an "Aoh" but it varies by group. I think modern Hebrew pronounces it identically with Kamatz. ​ בֵ - Tzeireih (Binah/Understanding) - "Ay" ​ בֶ - Segol (Chesed/Kindness) - like "Eh", a soft "e" ​ בְ - Sh'va (Gevurah/Severity/Judgement) - usually a pause, but if difficult to pronounce or two in a row then it is like a Segol (the first one is a pause and second like a Segol). ​ בֹ - Cholam (Tiferet/Beauty/Truth) - like "Oh". It is usually used with a Vav and the letter before will have no vowel. ​ בִ - Chirik (Netzach/Victory) - like "ee" ​ בֻ - Kubutz/Shuruk (Hod) - "Oo" ​ בוּ‎ - Milpum (Yesod) - "Oo" - same as Shuruk ​ No vowel is Malchut - Kingdom, Culmination, This World, Feminine ​ חֲ  &  חֳ- "Ah" ​ חֱ - "Eh" ​ ​​ Letters of Light , a great free book for Understanding on the Letters and Vowels (Vowels are at the bottom of the linked page) ​ ​ You read right to left so for example הָאָ֔רֶץ Ha-Ah-Reh-Tz HaAretz, (Hay is a prefix, 'The'), - The Land ​ (the vowel on top of the Alef is "trope" commentary - how to properly chant the tune of the Torah since I copied and pasted it from a version of Torah from Sefaria) Here is some basic information on the Trope commentary (*I don't know about accuracy since I was never really taught this yet) ​​​ Now you can highlight every individual word in Sefaria and begin memorizing the different root letters and their definitions with different vowelizations (Remember, Jastrow>BDB>Klein>Github). This will also help you increase in Understanding and Knowledge (through the correlations), and as the West loves to say, "Knowledge is Power" ​ If something doesn't come up it probably has a prefix or suffix and you need to highlight the root.​​​​​ ​​ -​ And slay you, My Masters Gods - Vehemeetcha Adonaiy Eloheem - In Hebrew - The first name is the name corresponding to the Sefirah - Divine Attribute of Malchut-Kingship, literally My Masters,  and the second name is of Tiferet-Beauty, Truth YH-VH (This name is a combination of the past, present, and future tenses of existing, to be)  - but is Ineffable so we say Eloheem - literally, Gods - the name of Gevurah-Judgement since the name of Malchut is usually used for it, but was just used Rashi says on this verse this is an eternal death - if HaShem allowed it in your mouth do not go back on it even in thought even if they beg you. Rather say How can I bless when HaShem has cursed? Or just ignore them or wave at them if they haven't flown away yet (like the movie Get Out different zombies' souls are constantly flying in and out of one body- although movies, dangerous sports, [and sports not for the sake of exercise - this is Bitul Torah - Negligence of Torah] and video games are prohibited as Shachak - dust/sport/mockery - unless they are educational but it will be hard to find a narrator that doesn't fall on us Heaven forbid - better to keep the sound off - also it is forbidden to watch animals mate) -Also sports like baseball and golf seem like more of an evil speech 'social hour' waste of time that could have been spent getting real exercise in 1/10th of the time spent. They are also voodoo curses and blasphemies. ​​ Alternatively you can wave your hands at them - never less than 4 fingers on a hand (a Tefach, handbreadth) this is sorcery - and if they have not given up on their donkeys yet (a metaphor for their bodies that shares the same root as clay that Adam was composed of - Chamor) it may be better to try to purify them by pushing them away lightly with the weak and and bringing them close strong or just with the right hand as both are included with a pure vessel/prop - a Torah, staff, cane, bag of fruit, large bottle of water (from Mishna Yadayim 1:1-4) A Torah is most preferable as it is compared to the sea and you can purify the whole world (it is said that Adam was as big as the whole world...)- Also do not purify anyone that is not teeth (that has accepted you and isn't hurting you) unless they revert to idolatry after being purified - then you can plow them with the curse or by waving your hands like a bird has wings or a fish has fins ​ The Mishnah near the end of Berachot says that after we curse the rebels we say "Ain Olam Ela Echad" There is no Universe but One - I think this will help deter you from having to "pray all day" (curse them on repeat) - as in the verse Tehillim 107 "Oh that man would pray all day" since in their insane corrupted vomit filled minds they think that they can rebel against HaShem, essentially create a new universe that is not His Will and have peace - Aha! ​ One needs to make this Blessing before beginning Torah study every day: בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה יְהֹוָה אֱלֹהֵינוּ מֶלֶךְ הָעוֹלָם אֲשֶׁר בָּחַר בָּנוּ מִכָּל הָעַמִּים וְנָתַן לָנוּ אֶת תּוֹרָתוֹ: בָּרוּךְ אַתָּה יְהֹוָה נוֹתֵן הַתּוֹרָה Blessed are You Adonai (My Masters) Our God King of the Universe Who has chosen us from all the peoples and has given to us His Torah. Blessed are You Adonai Who Gives The Torah ​​ Dvarim 32:2 יַֽעֲרֹ֤ף כַּמָּטָר֙ לִקְחִ֔י תִּזַּ֥ל כַּטַּ֖ל אִמְרָתִ֑י כִּשְׂעִירִ֣ם עֲלֵי־דֶ֔שֶׁא וְכִרְבִיבִ֖ים עֲלֵי־עֵֽשֶׂב My lesson will drip like rain; my word will flow like dew; like storm winds on vegetation and like raindrops on grass. ​ Rashi: like dew that everyone rejoices in and does not anguish people, and like storm winds that knock dead limbs off trees (Torah scholars) and promote growth ​ Also it is forbidden to study Torah in a restroom or near foul smelling filth/feces/urine unless it is covered and not touching you (urine can be touching you under your pants) Why? Out of respect to HaShem and His Children - HaShem, Torah, and The Jewish People are One - Zohar ​ I - אנכי ' Oh! I pray - אנא My Soul - נפשי In Writing - כתבית Is Given -יהבית From the Gemara-Talmud See that Yehavit is close to Zahavit - Is Golden ​ -- Dvarim-Deutoronomy 33:2 מִֽימִינ֕וֹ אֵ֥שׁ דָּ֖ת (כתיב אשדת) לָֽמוֹ "From His Right is a FireLaw (AyshDat) to them" - the proper name of the Torah Dat can also mean logic or religion - the logic behind why Heaven burns us that we can save ourselves with.​ It can also be novelized Da'at, Knowledge (a Quasi-Sefirah of ChochMah and Binah, like the "Child" of the "Father" [Wisdom] and "Mother" [Understanding] - in other words, how to apply our understandings of Torah) ​Also see that Aysh can be novelized as Eish - man or master. Become a master of knowledge/logic through His Torah. Be like a fire constantly ascending upwards and providing light, always burning anyone that touches you wrongly immediately ​ ​33:3​ אַ֚ף חֹבֵ֣ב עַמִּ֔ים Even a lover of the peoples 32:5 שִׁחֵ֥ת ל֛וֹ לֹ֖א בָּנָ֣יו מוּמָ֑ם "Destruction/corruption to Him is not, the blemish is His children's." Or, "Destruction is to Him, not His children (to destroy) - that is a blemish" ​ -- Zohar Bereisheit 11a Come and see how powerful is the might of the Torah, and how high it rises above all. Because whoever conducts his life according to the Torah has no fear of those Above or below, and all the mishaps or illnesses of this world do not concern him. Through the Torah, one is connected to the Tree of Life [which is Tiferet, the source of the Torah] and learns from it every day. Bereisheit Genesis 3:22 וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהִ֗ים הֵ֤ן הָֽאָדָם֙ הָיָה֙ כְּאַחַ֣ד מִמֶּ֔נּוּ לָדַ֖עַת ט֣וֹב וָרָ֑ע וְעַתָּ֣ה ׀ פֶּן־יִשְׁלַ֣ח יָד֗וֹ וְלָקַח֙ גַּ֚ם מֵעֵ֣ץ הַֽחַיִּ֔ים וְאָכַ֖ל וָחַ֥י לְעֹלָֽם׃ And God יהוה said, “Now that the man has become like The Unique One among Us, knowing good and bad [after eating from the Tree of Knowledge - also after heathen have relations with the Sat-ns and get exposed to the Applications of how Torah applies to us - Knowledge/Daat - without having earned it themselves and building strength), and now, lest he stretch out a hand and take also from the Tree of Life and eat, and live forever!” ​ Never stop meditating on your Torah (that you have acquired) and you will never die. Ash-medai was able to kill David HaMelech by distracting him for a split second from his Torah study (Gemara). ​ The Gemara-Talmud says and repeats THERE IS A COVENANT WITH THE LIPS ​ Bereisheit Genesis 25:27 וַֽיִּגְדְּלוּ֙ הַנְּעָרִ֔ים וַיְהִ֣י עֵשָׂ֗ו אִ֛ישׁ יֹדֵ֥עַ צַ֖יִד אִ֣ישׁ שָׂדֶ֑ה And it was - Esau was a master of knowledge of trapping - a man/master of the field. (Esau was notoriously wicked, so much that the family had to hide Rivkah's [Rebecca's] funeral so people would not come and disrespect her for giving birth to Esau) A field is made up on fallen plant parts and animal feces - Sat-nists that have spiritually "died" - Gemara Berachot says the wicked are called dead. They trap us and cause death through this covenant with the lips - by getting us to say evil things Shamayim Assur! Heaven Forbid! ​​ It is known that there are 70 Faces to the Torah ​ Chabad Yeshayahu-Isaiah 18:1 ה֥וֹי אֶ֖רֶץ צִלְצַ֣ל כְּנָפָ֑יִם אֲשֶׁ֥ר מֵעֵ֖בֶר לְנַֽהֲרֵי־כֽוּש Woe to the land shaded by wings, which is on the other side of the rivers of Cush. Other faces: Woe to the land of the treacherous screeching wing spearing fish harpooning flying crickets that is from impregnating the kings (Rashi says rivers are a metaphor for kings) of Cush (Africa). ​ Or, from "male membering" the African kings. As in, for taking tons of large slave ships across the Atlantic and stuffing Africans full of them in deadly torturous conditions. For example, the sages teach "One who acquires a slave acquires a master" since you have to constantly make sure their needs are met and they are in good health. One has to make sure his/her slaves and animals have food before one can eat since it is easy to neglect them after being sated. Our possessions are an extension of ourselves (since we are responsible for them and damage they cause H'F') so it is a look at how their "parent trees" viewed themselves, and "the seed doesn't fall from from the tree" ​ -Sorry I thought I had posted this face before but it seems it was conspired against H'F' ​ (***Obviously every dark skinned person is not automatically evil and we do not recall the sins of parents on righteous people [Cham, the patriarch of Africa, castrated and raped Noach our father for more power since there would be less peoples, and another face is 'for forgiving the sin of'], only wicked. This is talking about the gangsters that would devour the family and possessions of a G-d fearing person like a cricket swarm H'F' were it not for the fear of the government, and also that make "trap" music to kill souls H'F') ​​ רַבִּי חֲנִינָא סְגַן הַכֹּהֲנִים אוֹמֵר, הֱוֵי מִתְפַּלֵּל בִּשְׁלוֹמָהּ שֶׁל מַלְכוּת, שֶׁאִלְמָלֵא מוֹרָאָהּ, אִישׁ אֶת רֵעֵהוּ חַיִּים בְּלָעוֹ. רַבִּי חֲנִינָא בֶן תְּרַדְיוֹן אוֹמֵר, שְׁנַיִם שֶׁיּוֹשְׁבִין וְאֵין בֵּינֵיהֶן דִּבְרֵי תוֹרָה, הֲרֵי זֶה מוֹשַׁב לֵצִים, שֶׁנֶּאֱמַר (תהלים א) וּבְמוֹשַׁב לֵצִים לֹא יָשָׁב. אֲבָל שְׁנַיִם שֶׁיּוֹשְׁבִין וְיֵשׁ בֵּינֵיהֶם דִּבְרֵי תוֹרָה, שְׁכִינָה שְׁרוּיָה בֵינֵיהֶם, שֶׁנֶּאֱמַר (מלאכי ג) אָז נִדְבְּרוּ יִרְאֵי יְיָ אִישׁ אֶל רֵעֵהוּ וַיַּקְשֵׁב יְיָ וַיִּשְׁמָע וַיִּכָּתֵב סֵפֶר זִכָּרוֹן לְפָנָיו לְיִרְאֵי יְיָ וּלְחֹשְׁבֵי שְׁמוֹ. ​ --->Rabbi Hanina, the vice-high priest said: pray for the welfare of the government, for were it not for the fear it inspires, every man would swallow his neighbor alive. ​ R. Hananiah ben Teradion said: if two sit together and there are no words of Torah [spoken] between them, then this is a session of scorners, as it is said: “nor sat he in the seat of the scornful…[rather, the teaching of the Lord is his delight]” (Psalms 1:1); but if two sit together and there are words of Torah [spoken] between them, then the Shekhinah abides among them, as it is said: “then they that feared the Lord spoke one with another; and the Lord hearkened and heard, and a book of remembrance was written before Him, for them that feared the Lord and that thought upon His name” (Malachi 3:16). ​ ​Devarim 28:42 כׇּל־עֵצְךָ֖ וּפְרִ֣י אַדְמָתֶ֑ךָ יְיָרֵ֖שׁ הַצְּלָצַֽל׃ The cricket shall take over all the trees and produce of your land. ​ When the upright westerners started singing along to rap music the entire West became vile overly licentious wicked dogs pursuing money and sex and murdering people like the gangsters rapped about Therefore it is necessary to immediately cleanse yourself of these evil covenants by saying Ani Ay-l Sh-adai. The first is that when it is permitted for public use - when people eat from his/her fruits The second is at a "daughter of seven" "Bat Sheva" - When he/she has been religious and submissive to The Master - HaShem and His Torah for 7 years. The last opinion according to Rabbi Akiva is "Like its name" ​ ​ Tzafoniah 3:9 כִּי־אָ֛ז אֶהְפֹּ֥ךְ אֶל־עַמִּ֖ים שָׂפָ֣ה בְרוּרָ֑ה לִקְרֹ֚א כֻלָּם֙ בְּשֵׁ֣ם יְהֹוָ֔ה לְעָבְד֖וֹ שְׁכֶ֥ם אֶחָד: Indeed then I will change the peoples to pure lips to call, all of them, in The Name of HaShem to worship as one ​ Sforno says on Bereisheit-Genesis 2:19 when Adam names all the animals that one's name is alluding to his/her essence and Divine Service The quickest way to increase your spiritual level is to get out of your impure names and name yourself after someone holy like Avraham Yitzhak or Yaakov or other Prophets from Torah (All names even middle names) - Selah! Lift up your heads, O gates! And be lifted up, O everlasting doors! And the King of kavod shall come in. Who is this King of kavod? YHVH strong and mighty, YHVH mighty in battle!” ​ Another face: Lift up the gates of your heads and the everlasting doors will be lifted and will come the King of Glory If you are able (do not die about it) you can read my thoughts/visions with full approved history - nothing embarassing unless there is an important lesson - also give me a slight delay please in real time - 1-2 minutes to discourage crickets giving me a piece of their mind ​ בְּקוֹל שֵׁנִי אוֹמֵר. שְׂאוּ שְׁעָרִים רָאשֵׁיכֶם וּשְׂאוּ פִּתְחֵי עוֹלָם וְיָבֹא מֶלֶךְ הַכָּבוֹד: מִי הוּא זֶה מֶלֶךְ הַכָּבוֹד יי צְבָאוֹת הוּא מֶלֶךְ הַכָּבוֹד סֶלָה: (תהילים כד ט-י) In its second call, it says, “Lift up your heads, O gates! Lift them up, O everlasting doors! And the King of kavod shall come in. Who is He, this King of kavod? YHVH Tseva’ot, he is the King of kavod, Selah!” ​ ​ בְּקוֹל שְׁלִישִׁי אוֹמֵר עִמְדוּ צַדִּיקִים וְעִסְקוּ בַּתּוֹרָה, כְּדֵי שֶׁיִּהְיֶה שְׂכַרְכֶם כָּפוּל לָעוֹלָם הַבָּא: In its third call it says, “Stand, O righteous ones, and busy yourselves with Torah, so that your reward shall be double in Olam Haba.” ​ Faces: Tzadikim will stand when occupied in Torah - Shema, Berachot, and study in order to show Cavod-Honor to HaShem - This is the way it always was until recently but I say that blue collar workers are slaving for 8-12 hours a day on their feet and we can't read and think while standing?
